review.title: “Great”
review.pros: Pros – Getting the challenging opportunities to show my skills, satisfying salary, great employees, freely working environment.
review.cons: Cons – I haven't experienced any downsides at V-chitra till now. Everything is positive.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I believe the main goal of any management position is to get things done by evenly distributing the workload to the most qualified members of the team. They also make sure that each member of the team has all the resources and training that are necessary to complete the job. They are loyal and are always working in the best interest of the company. Their job is tough; they must evaluate employee performance, empower members of the team and be able to identify those who are not pulling their own weight.
